name: The Nazarova Chest
description: Simple in silhouette but rich in allure and appeal, the Nazarova chest offers a delectable finishing touch to the high-fashion home. Elevate the humble chest from simply a means of storage to a statement piece of luxury furniture. Placed by both sides of a bed, in a living space at the end of a sophisticated sofa, or even as an addition to an elegant office, the Nazarova has the potential to bring a room together while simultaneously standing out as a mark of impeccable taste. Alongside the matching dining table, cabinet, coffee table, or perhaps all three, the Nazarova chest dazzles and creates a sleek, integrated aesthetic experience. The handles are available in polished or brushed brass or nickel, antiqued brass, for a dash of high-end glamour. All are available either circular or rectangular, depending on your preferred look. DAVIDSON's service allows you to choose your preferred finish from our range of luxury timbers.
